question: Which country will host the huge war games exercise "Aurora" with NATO?
explanation: Sweden hosts huge war games exercise with NATO. It is biggest military exercise in more than 20 years with support from NATO countries. This involves 19,000 troops and will replicate an attack from the east on the Baltic island of Gotland, near the Swedish mainland. Around 1,500 of the military personnel are from the United States, France, Norway and other NATO allies.
